local_intent: Perform lowering until contact (with retry), verify contact, place using blackboard pose, release, and retreat.
assumptions: Robot is positioned above the red_plate (MoveAbove already executed)
Contact sensor and gripper are functional
coherence_with_global: Implements the active 'LowerUntilContact' micro-goal from the global tree, then performs verification, PlaceAt, OpenGripper, Retreat, and Wait consistent with the overall place sequence.
